title: Leftover bugs from PR about account selector implementation (IOS only)
body:
This is leftover from https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/13883 (before fixing make sure that PR is already merged into develop)
Below issues were fixed on Android but still reproducible on IOS

### ISSUE 1 Switching between 3 or more different accounts while offline results in displaying second selected account on the side of connected dapp after coming back online instead of last selected account

**Preconditions:** User has 3 different accounts (for example Account 1, Account 2, Account 3)

**Steps:**
1. Connect to dapp (I use this one for testing https://app.uniswap.org/chain=mainnet#/swap?chain=mainnet) via wallet connect (lets say you select Account 1 during initial connect)
2. Go offline (turn on flight mode on your device)
3. While offline, open Manage app connections settings and switch connection between 3 existing accounts (for example, select Account 2, then Account 3 and at last Account 1)
3. Go back online
4. Open connected dapp https://app.uniswap.org/chain=mainnet#/swap?chain=mainnet and see which account is displayed as connected

**Actual result:** Account 3 is displayed as connected

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/97245802/190646781-f098f75b-6220-4c24-8077-9d23835b3cef.mp4

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/9584292/Status.log)

**Expected result:** Account 1 is displayed as connected 

### ISSUE 2 Confirmation pop up does not appear every time in Status app after re-triggering operation on dapp side if Show again button tapped in Signing phrase pop up

For reproduction use https://app.uniswap.org/chain=mainnet#/swap?chain=mainnet

**Steps:** 

1. Generate > 1 additional wallets
2. Connect https://app.uniswap.org/chain=mainnet#/swap?chain=mainnet via wallet connect
3. Trigger swap operation on dapp side
4. Tap Show again on signing phrase pop up 
5. Close confirmation pop up. 
6. Pay attention that pop up with signing phrase for some reason appears for the second time after closing. You should also tap Show again when it appears for the second time. 
7. Trigger one more swap operation on dapp side
8. See if pop up in Status appears this time 

**Actual result:** 
1. Signing phrase pop up appears for 2 times
2. Confirmation pop up does not re-appear after re-triggering operation on dapp side

**Expected result:** 
1. Signing phrase pop up should appear once during 1 confirmation if user selected Show again. 
2. Confirmation pop up should appear every time when transaction is triggered on dapp side. 


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/97245802/190646888-032104c6-a528-49bd-a12e-08ab247cb502.mp4


### ISSUE 3 Confirmation pop up appears couple of times in case of cancellation or signing

For reproduction of this bug you should select "Got it" instead of "Show again" during initial triggering of operation

**Steps:** 

1. Generate > 1 additional wallets
2. Connect https://app.uniswap.org/chain=mainnet#/swap?chain=mainnet via wallet connect
3. Trigger swap operation on dapp side
4. Close confirmation pop up or sign operation. 
5. Pay attention if confirmation pop up re-appears

**Actual result:** confirmation pop up re-appears. If not, try to trigger one more swap operation in dapp. 

**Expected result:** confirmation pop up should not re-appear if confirmation is cancelled or signed. 


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/97245802/190646895-2a367967-acbf-4aa1-b4f6-5c7e47b042a2.mp4





### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: iOS
